Keywords: Maximum Carnage , Monster
Real Name: Unknown
Special Powers
MAXIMUM CARNAGE: Once per turn when Doppleganger hits, after resolutions deal 1 penetrating damage to up to 2 opposing characters that weren't hit but are adjacent to a hit character.
MATERNAL BOND: At the beginning of your turn, if Doppelganger is within 4 squares of a friendly character named Shriek, remove an action token from him.
RAZOR WEBS: Smoke Cloud as FREE, but only to generate one marker. If an opposing character moves through that marker, after resolutions deal that character 1 penetrating damage.
KILLING MACHINE: Charge, Flurry.

Comments
September 20, 2020
SwaggyJay
Been waiting for a remake of this guy for so long and he does not disappoint. Finally played him today on a team with the OG Maximum Carnage team (using the fast forces Carnage), and with Shriek nearby to let him take tokens off every turn he was an absolute monster. I completely forgot to use his Razor Webs power but kept him top-dial (aided by a Venom Symbiote) the whole game, and he Flurry/BFC’d everyone in his path. I’d like to get the prime too, but this one is more than satisfying if I can’t.
September 18, 2020
spider_ham
@Bat-Phreak: In addition, as long as opposing characters are moving, and not being knocked back or placed out of Doppelganger's marker, its effect will activate. AVAS019 Cammi's Anti-Personnel Mines work the same way.
September 18, 2020
Bat-Phreak
ThePancakeMan is correct. Page 11 of 2018 Rulebook: "Squares that a character 'moves through' includes all squares it occupied during that move, including the square it began movement in and the square it ends in."
September 3, 2020
machineman
I like this update on an old favorite fig. How good will those razor webs be on the right indoor maps? Hit-and-run late dial and drop a free booby trap in the doorway!
September 2, 2020
ThePancakeMan
Yes. A character is considered to move through all squares during a move action. Including if the character side stepped in place.
September 2, 2020
DonJoaquin
If I place that razor webs marker on a square occupied by an opponent character and they move out of it, do they still get damaged?

Guess I can finally retire my WoS version. Pretty solid replacement too.

Good to see Doppelganger re-appear after a lengthy absence. He's got the Max. Carnage ATA nod, close to Shriek trait. The Razor Webs trait has got "use the Web Clix FX" written all over it.
